EarmarkingCategory.name: Unearmarked
EarmarkingCategory.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes A,B or C.

EarmarkingCategory.name: Softly Earmarked
EarmarkingCategory.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes D,E or F.

EarmarkingCategory.name: Earmarked
EarmarkingCategory.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes G or H.

EarmarkingCategory.name: Tightly Earmarked
EarmarkingCategory.description: Any or all of the Earmarking Modality codes I,J or K.
